game.name: Ooga
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Includes level editor, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Help Ooga to retrieve his stolen food stockpile in this fast-paced, spear-based parkour platformer. Play the first world and a half in the free demo, secrets included!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Help Ooga to retrieve his stolen food stockpile in this fast-paced, spear-based parkour platformer. Play the first world and a half in the free demo, secrets included!
